flawed_nl_solution:
1/3rd of the workers before the new hires were women because 1 - (2/3) = 1/3
There were 30 women working for the company before the new hires
There are now 40 women working for the company because 30 + 10 = <<30+10=40>>40
There are 1000 people working for the company because 90 + 10 = <<90+10=1000>>1000
The proportion of women working in the company is 1/25 because 40 / 1000 = <<40/1000=1/25>>1/25
The percentage of women working in the company is now 4 because 1/25 x 100 = <<1/25*100=4>>4
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
